description:
Susanowo has gone out of control, and destroyed the Cherry Blossom Baths and put Kei`ichirou into a coma.  Chiharu blames Kiriko for this.  Faced with her own feelings of responsibility, Kiriko wanders through the city where she encounters Ryouma Sakamoto.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: After the Rampage, the Two Make Their Decision
Au bout de la furie, deux personnes déterminées
Bousou no Hate, Ketsui no Futari
暴走の果て, 決意の二人
